name: Pufferfish (lettucepie)
description:
Pufferfish is a 3D arcade style game, with some (intentionally) irritating controls. The objective is to navigate "Pufferfish" through the rings, within 5 minutes (300 seconds). The puffer cannot swim however, so you have to inflate and deflate to move around.

---------
This is my first game submission to itch.io in general, and it's for a Game Jam. I've been toying around with Unity3d for a few years, but have never felt compelled/pressured to release anything, so I joined this Game Jam thing just 3 hours prior to try it out. I didn't know at all how much I could do with a limited set of a time, so I aimed very low and simple. I managed to finish this up with an extra day remaining, so I plan on aiming higher next time :).

Mini Jam 33: Underwater

"https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-33-underwater"
